coreAttributes.name: Bunny Juice
coreAttributes.description: A small plastic bottle of what appears to be some sort of carrot juice, labelled as 'Bunny Juice'. On the label, there's a rather obscene image of a rabbit-girl stuffing a carrot-shaped dildo into her pussy.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
A warm wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_FERTILITY, 5)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_VIRILITY, 5)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_RESISTANCE_LUST, -10)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unscrew)] the Bunny Juice's cap and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the liquid contained within. An intense taste of carrots instantly fills [npc.her] mouth, and after greedily gulping down the entire beverage, [npc.she] [npc.verb(discover)] that it has an unusually sweet aftertaste.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unscrew)] the Bunny Juice's cap and [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to drink the liquid contained within. An intense taste of carrots instantly fills [npc2.her] mouth, and after greedily gulping down the entire beverage, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(discover)] that it has an unusually sweet aftertaste.
